name: Root Canal
description:
Lead an army of bacteria mining through a tooth!

Made for Global Game Jam 2023.

Controls:
Click on bacteria to select, click anywhere else to deselect.

While a bacteria is selected, right-click on a tile to mine.

While a bacteria is selected, right-click on a location to move there.

Arrow keys to move camera (you can also move the mouse to the side of the screen)
